author: A D Balasubramaniyan
text:
Police caught nine Ukrainian nationals including two women for flying an Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) in Tiruvannamalai Hill and taking videos.

However, after interrogation police were convinced that they were all devotees and released them. But the UAV they used was seized.

Police had received a tip-off that nine foreigners had climbed the Tiruvannamalai Hill on Monday and stayed the night, and were about to fly a drone over the hill. Police secured them from a place called Skandashram. Those interrogated were identified as Dima Kunin (29), Vaolim Zinchenko (44), Vlady Slav Kotsiuba (36), Saolovaya (57), Maxim Kisevskl (37), Tanchyr Oleg (60), Vitaliy Bugara (35), Olena Slobodyvyova (29), Dkana Bondarenk (29) and Alexandrs Godiaeva (27).

They told police that they wanted to shoot the sunrise in Tiruvannamalai hill.
title: 9 Ukrainian nationals held for flying drone, released
